song_name: Sonic Lost World - Windy Hill Act 1
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Sonic Lost World - Windy Hill Act 1 is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Sonic Lost World - Windy Hill Act 1 has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Major,  and C Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
